measured_by: Economic Risky Decision Making Task (lottery choices)
justification: “Participants completed an economic decision making task … which has been used in previous studies to quantify individuals' risk preferences.”
“We fit a probabilistic choice model with two free parameters … to quantify individual risk attitudes,” where Alpha indexed risk attitude.

measured_by: Alpha parameter from Friend Predicted condition
justification: “The Friend Predicted condition is meant to capture participants' beliefs about their friend's risk preferences,” and Alpha was estimated from those predicted choices.
“Weightfriend (w) represents how much one's utility is based on one's own outcome in contrast to how much one incorporates their estimation of their friend's outcome.”

measured_by: Relinquishing preferred option indicator in Preference Revealed condition
justification: “We evaluated in Preference Revealed condition … whether participants would relinquish their original preferred option so their friend could receive it (coded as 1).”
“Proportion of risky choices … calculated as the number of risky options participants selected … as a simple behavioral readout of risk preference.”
